ModMetaData.name: Night Lights
ModMetaData.author: Zylle
ModMetaData.description:
Colorful sculptures that light up at night! Requires "colored lights" research to build.
Night lights use sculpture graphics! If you have extra modded sculpture graphics, night lights will appear in those shapes too!
Discord: https://discord.gg/4EFv76C ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/zylleon
